description: Enhance the spot price page with improved clock chart visuals, hover interactions, and a horizontal bar chart with expandable quarter-hour details

tasks.title: Increase clock chart font sizes and legend sizes
tasks.description: Update spot-clock-chart.blade.php: Increase hour marker font-size from 13 to 16 (lines 161, 194-196). Increase legend text to text-base and dots to w-4 h-4 (lines 203-211).

tasks.title: Add gaps between clock chart segments
tasks.description: Update spot-clock-chart.blade.php: Add stroke='#ffffff' and stroke-width='1.5' to segment paths (lines 133-143) to create visible white gaps between colored segments.

tasks.title: Add hover tooltip to clock chart segments
tasks.description: Update spot-clock-chart.blade.php: Wrap SVG in Alpine.js component with x-data='{ hovered: null }'. Add @mouseenter and @mouseleave events to paths. Show tooltip with hour range, price, and % difference from average when hovered. Add CSS in app.css for .clock-segment:hover with filter: brightness(1.1) and subtle transform scale.

tasks.title: Add helper methods for bar chart data in SpotPrice.php
tasks.description: Update SpotPrice.php: Add method getTodayPricesWithMeta() that returns today's prices with colorClass, widthPercent, and timestamp. Add method getTomorrowPricesWithMeta() for tomorrow's prices (if available after ~14:00). Ensure quarterPricesByHour is accessible as a public property keyed by hour timestamp.

tasks.title: Create horizontal bar chart with accordion quarters
tasks.description: Update spot-price.blade.php: Replace the Chart.js canvas section with a custom Alpine.js horizontal bar chart. Show 'Tänään' section with today's remaining hours as horizontal bars. Add 'Huomenna' section if tomorrow prices are available. Each bar is clickable to expand an accordion showing 4 quarter-hour prices in a grid. Color-code bars based on price range (green/yellow/red). Highlight current hour/quarter with coral color.

tasks.title: Style quarter accordion with CSS
tasks.description: Update app.css: Add smooth collapse animation for accordion if needed. Style quarter cards with consistent padding and colors. Ensure responsive layout works on mobile.

tasks.title: Build assets and verify implementation
tasks.description: Run 'cd laravel && npm run build' to compile assets. Run 'php artisan serve' and verify at http://127.0.0.1:8000/spot-price that: 1) Hour markers are larger, 2) White gaps visible between segments, 3) Hover shows tooltip, 4) Horizontal bars show today+tomorrow, 5) Clicking bar expands quarter details.
